summary: A port of the Tutti Colori theme from the Espresso editor
name: TuttiColori-Colorscheme
description:
A light, candy colored theme, ported from the default theme shipped with the Espresso editor for OS X (http://macrabbit.com/espresso)

The canonical version is available on git-hub, with a screenshot at: http://github.com/lygaret/vimscripts
